chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following issue:

Disfunction of the simple card reader and microphone.

Disfunction of the charging port as well.

Thank you for your help,

Once you receive the package, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process its return (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage as a result of a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data deletion has been performed.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories and a proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process its return (if you're eligible).

Hello,
My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following issue:
Malfunction of SIM card reader, microphone, and charging port
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
